A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie was a complete bust!

SPOILER TO FOLLOW: 

they spend the entire movie running from the first order\, the princess can now survive in cold dark space\, Jedis' can now project himself on a planet light years away\, and what's with the giant ships that the first order "magically" just happened to have stashed away somewhere? And then there's the whole part about Poe having to escape the first order\, fly to a random planet\, find a random guy in a random casino to try to get away from the first order... and all the while the rebellion is just trying not to run out of fuel? That's it? Seriously? Worst of the series so far.
